name: Barnacle Boy
description:
This is not a virus,but if you for whatever reason run two or more iterations of this program at same time maybe it will freeze your pc(this is still not confirmed) use task manager or alt+f4 to close this program.

This a simple program made in c# that will put a few animated gifs on your desktop (barnacle boy will follow your cursor) if you leave the program open for 20 seconds,a popup will appear offering you help,if you click the "yes" button another popup box will open saying that your pc is trashed and that it can't be fixed (obviously a lie). That's about it.

also there is a secret,try to find it...
